sentences.en: Cellular cleavage and proliferation was markedly inhibited.
sentences.cn: 细胞的分裂、增殖受到明显抑制。

sentences.en: Cellular phones are inherently insecure, as anyone can listen to and record conversations.
sentences.cn: 手机天生就不安全，因为任何人都可以听到并录下谈话。

sentences.en: Many of the cellular biosynthetic pathways were first elucidated.
sentences.cn: 首次阐明了许多细胞内生物合成的途径.

sentences.en: Many people use cellular materials as sensitive elements in hygrometers.
sentences.cn: 很多人用蜂窝状的材料作为测量温度的传感元件.

sentences.en: Many toxic effects can be studied at the cellular level.
sentences.cn: 许多毒效可以从细胞层次上去研究。

sentences.en: She has a cellular telephone in her car.
sentences.cn: 她的汽车里有一部无线通讯电话机.

sentences.en: The adenylate energy charge, for example, will affect many cellular processes in all types of organisms.
sentences.cn: 例如, 腺苷酸能荷会影响所有各类型有机体内的许多细胞过程.

sentences.en: The albumins contain the majority of the cellular enzymes and are thus extremely heterogeneous.
sentences.cn: 清蛋白包含细胞的酶的大多数,因而是极其不均匀的.

sentences.en: The organization has a cellular structure.
sentences.cn: 这个组织像蜂窝一样,由许多独立工作的小组组成.

sentences.en: The towers are normally constructed of cellular sections.
sentences.cn: 塔柱通常做成空腹断面.

sentences.en: This release of the products of cellular protoplasm to the extracellular fluid accounts for several events.
sentences.cn: 细胞浆产物进入细胞外液后被排出,即可导致以下各现象.

sentences.en: We are still very far from explaining how photochrome acts on a cellular or molecular level.
sentences.cn: 关于光敏色素怎样在细胞水平或分子水平上发生作用,我们现在还远远不能解释.

sentences.en: When a drug permeates a cell, it must obviously traverse the cellular plasma membrane.
sentences.cn: 当药物透过细胞时, 它显然必定要穿过胞浆膜.

sentences.en: When he's out on the road, office calls are forwarded to the cellular phone in his truck.
sentences.cn: 他在路上时，打到办公室的电话会转接到卡车里的移动电话上。

words.tran_cn: 细胞性；多孔性；细胞结构
[细胞][数]细胞的；[岩]多孔的；由细胞组成的

phrases.tran_cn: 细胞工程；蜂窝工程；小区工程
n. 泡沫玻璃（海绵状薄玻璃的一种）

trans.tran_cn: 细胞的，由细胞组成的，多孔的，蜂窝状
trans.tran_en: consisting of or relating to the cells of plants or animals
